title: Verify: Implement Node-Level Error Handling
description:
Run automated tests for task T-064.
Review changes and verify acceptance criteria.
Original: Add per-node retry configuration, timeout, fallback path, structured error codes, and execution state checkpointing to the execution engine.
Criteria:
- Nodes can retry on failure with configurable delay
- Timeouts are enforced per node
- Fallback path is used on repeated failure
- Structured error codes returned
- Checkpointing allows resume from last successful node
acceptance_criteria: Nodes can retry on failure with configurable delay
Fallback path is used on repeated failure
